visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent monthly temperature data with a custom color scheme. Additionally, configure the chart with a legend that has a border width of 2 and set the chart's background color.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a spline chart titled 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart includes a legend with a border width of 2 and a background color of light gray (#f9f9f9). The x-axis represents months with styled labels and a title, while the y-axis represents temperature in degrees Celsius with similarly styled labels and a title. The data series includes monthly temperature data with a custom color of teal (#008080). Additional custom colors are provided for potential future series, ensuring a consistent color scheme.
